segments.text: Those are today ’ s top stories . Now let ’ s go to John for the weather . John , what does the forecast look like for our weekend travelers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid we ’ re in for a rough weekend , Mary . There is a storm system moving through the East Coast . It will be drizzling all day today , and there ’ s a 60 percent chance of thunderstorms this eve
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s pretty chilly for the summer ! Will it rain on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , yes . It will be clear early Saturday morning but there is a high chance of showers and thunderstorms later in the day . There is a severe thunderstorm warning for some parts of the Sout
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That certainly sounds like a dreary Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It gets better on Sunday , though . The storm systems move east and the skies will clear up at night . It will still be rather cool , with highs in the low 50s . The West Coast will be experiencing some
segments.speaker: S2
